name: clipindex-extension
description: 智能摘录工具 - 选中网页文本自动保存，支持多语言瀑布流展示

scripts.dev: bun run build:dev && bun run watch
scripts.build:dev: bun run clean && bun run copy-static && bun run build:ts && bun run bundle && bun run build:css
scripts.build:prod: bun run clean && bun run copy-static && bun run build:ts && bun run bundle && bun run build:css && bun run minify
scripts.watch: bun run build:dev && bunx concurrently "bunx tsc --watch" "bunx tailwindcss -i src/styles/main.css -o dist/library.css --watch"
scripts.copy-static: bun run copy:manifest && bun run copy:html
scripts.minify: bunx terser dist/**/*.js -o dist/bundle.min.js --compress --mangle && mv dist/bundle.min.js dist/background.js
